snippet: The Hudson Project, a three-day music and arts festival that begins on Friday, occupies the same ground where the original Woodstock festival was supposed to have taken place.
abstract: New music and arts festival Hudson Project will take place on farm in Saugerties, NY, that was supposed to be site of original Woodstock festival; producer Michael Lang and production companies MCP Presents and SFX Entertainment hope it will be constantly evolving recurring event.
lead_paragraph: The Hudson Project, a three-day music and arts festival that begins on Friday, occupies the same ground where the original Woodstock festival was supposed to have taken place.

headline.main: 3 Days of Peace, Music and a Concierge
headline.print_headline: 3 Days of Peace, Music and a Concierge
